name: Daedalus-build your way
description:
Hi,

This is a mini platform game. 

The orginal version is made for Mini Jam 101: Limit.

The Jam version is Here:

https://iamata.itch.io/gameforminijam101

How to:

Press A\D to move, and press Space to jump.

Mouse left-click the icon to select the "platform" and build it in the game.

Credits:

Music:  JumpyGame by Rizwan Ashraft

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/free-music-tracks-for-games-15...

Font:  Vonwaon Bitmap Font by Haoyu Qiu

https://timothyqiu.itch.io/vonwaon-bitmap

Assets:  Pixel Adventure 1/2  by Pixel Frog

https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1

UI:  Input Prompts Pixel 16× (1.0) 

Created/distributed by Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

https://kenney-assets.itch.io/input-prompts-pixel-16
